RoomComponent.m_description: Dust rises from your footsteps as you make your way down a gravel filled ravine. large rocks are scattered along the banks.  Clanging fills the air, and you soon find a tunnel entrance carved into the ground.  Crude railtracks lead inside, and you hear the sound of shrill voices that could only be goblins. Not far away, the brush and trees thicken as the forest grows deeper.
